display_long_description:
Welcome to Toon Commando – VR Shooting Game, a fun and action-filled VR shooter set in a vibrant cartoon-style city overrun by mischievous toon soldiers. As the only commando left on duty, your mission is simple: survive wave after wave of enemies and keep the city safe using your VR shooting skills.

The game drops you straight into the middle of a colorful toon world where chaos never stops. Enemy soldiers rush in from streets, rooftops, alleys, and corners of the city, each wave becoming faster and more challenging. With responsive VR controls and smooth gunplay, you can aim freely, shoot accurately, and enjoy a satisfying arcade-style experience.

Every battle feels lively thanks to expressive toon animations, bright city environments, and humorous enemy behavior. From quick-moving scouts to aggressive attackers, each soldier type brings a fun twist to the battlefield. The wave system increases intensity gradually, giving players the perfect balance of challenge and nonstop action.

Whether you’re looking for quick, high-energy sessions or longer survival runs, the game keeps you engaged with endless waves and a city full of surprises. Master your aim, improve your reaction time, and push your limits to achieve higher scores as waves continue to rise.

Built for Meta Quest, Toon Commando – VR Shooting Game offers smooth performance, easy controls, and immersive 360° action designed for all VR players. Step into the toon city, lock and load, and show these soldiers who the
